channel.title: Rahul Setrakian
channel.description: Hi, my name is Rahul Setrakian. I'm a self-taught programmer with a passion for cybersecurity and innovation. Join me on this exciting journey!

item.title: Importance of Two-Factor Authentication in Online Security
item.description: Blog Two-Factor Authentication, Cybersecurity, Authentication Methods Importance of Two-Factor Authentication in Online Security With a thorough understanding of 2FA, you can better safeguard your digital presence and mitigate the risks associated with unauthorized access & data breaches. Reading Time Mins View Views Publish Date September 17, 2023 1. Introduction to Two-Factor Authentication In today’s digital landscape, the security of our online accounts and personal information is of paramount importance. With the increasing prevalence of cyber threats and data breaches, it has become essential to implement robust security measures to protect ourselves and our sensitive data.

item.title: Cryptojacking: What It Is and How to Prevent It
item.description: Blog Cryptojacking, Cryptocurrency Security, Malware Cryptojacking: What It Is and How to Prevent It In this article, you can learn to enhance the security of your cryptocurrency wallet and mitigate the risk of falling victim to cryptojacking attacks. Reading Time Mins View Views Publish Date September 12, 2023 1. Introduction to cryptocurrency wallets and cryptojacking attacks Cryptocurrency wallets have become an essential tool for securely storing and managing digital assets.

item.title: Differences Between Front-End & Back-End Development
item.description: Blog Front-End Development, Back-End Development, Web Development Roles Differences Between Front-End & Back-End Development Front-end and back-end development are two essential components that collectively power the web applications we interact with every day. Reading Time Mins View Views Publish Date September 5, 2023 1. Introduction to Front-End and Back-End Development Front-end and back-end development are two essential components that collectively power the web applications we interact with every day. While both contribute to the seamless functioning of websites and web applications, they involve distinct sets of skills, technologies, and responsibilities.

item.title: Harry Potter – CTF Walkthrough
item.description: Blog TryHackMe, Write-Up, Capture The Flag Harry Potter – CTF Walkthrough Harry Potter CTF walkthrough, This is the official write-up, and I will guide you through the whole process step by step. Reading Time Mins View Views Publish Date July 25, 2023 CTF Walkthrough Hello there, welcome to the official write-up of Harry Potter – CTF. I created this room for fun. I made this room in a few hours.

item.title: India's Ban on Encrypted Messaging Apps: A Disturbing Assault on Privacy and Free Speech
item.description: Blog Privacy, Free Speech, Encryption India's Ban on Encrypted Messaging Apps: A Disturbing Assault on Privacy and Free Speech India's ban on encrypted messaging apps undermines privacy and free speech, setting a dangerous precedent for democracy and citizens' rights. Reading Time Mins View Views Publish Date June 27, 2023 India’s Ban on Encrypted Messaging Apps “Privacy is not a privilege, it is a fundamental right.” - Edward Snowden In a shocking move, India, once hailed as the world’s largest democracy, has taken a giant leap towards eroding privacy and stifling free speech by banning encrypted messaging apps on a massive scale.
